course_description: This course presents an introductory examination of the complex contexts of women's health globally, with a focus on sexual and reproductive health and rights. Theoretical concepts of power, culture, gender, and justice are applied throughout the course as a framework for understanding and critique.
sections: Class Nbr: 4287, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: T 10-11:50a, Instructor: S. Spangler, Status: Open
